extensionDescription.message: Travian 4 extension that adds some 'missing' features to the game.

popup_NoProfilesAvailable.message: This list will automatically populate with your accounts after you first log in to Travian.

popup_NoProfilesAvailableHelp.message: To add new profile, click on 'Add' button and fill-in the form or just open new Travian game for which you would like to create a profile. By filling the form, you can check 'Auto login' feature which is not available otherwise.

popup_AddProfile_PasswordDisclaimer.message: Password will be saved on local machine and only be used for Travian login page.
